attributes.contentHtml:
Aplimmm hosting stuff is not company? Kid. First before bullying other ppl go learn shit first hosting is literly count a company. Oh i know why you think hosting is not company, maybe bc you are just a dumb ass kid who dosent know about anything and just using your mom credit card to buy stuff in game, sorry i apologise it kid.

he was right u have to learn English

and technically to make a company you need to register it as a trademark which cost like $500 in us ( idk )
and i are providing service to users online it will be called as a service provider and they also need a Privacy policy in order to keep their user's data safe
